name: Ice Cream Jump for Kids
description:
This is a special version of Ice Cream Jump designed to be as child friendly as possible. There are no in-app purchases, no ads, and no links to leave the app. Just simple jumping ice cream fun.

----------------------------------

Meet a happy Ice Cream Scoop who dreams of soaring through the skies.

Help our friendly dessert reach new heights in this action packed game.

Bounce from platform to platform, dodge the mean flies, and grab everything you can to get the highest score.

Great fun to play with friends, who can go the highest in Ice Cream Jump.

Ice Cream Jump features dozens of character and accessory options, multiple background themes to choose from, hundreds of potential combinations.
